page.syntax: SAVE_ADB_DEF( Database_Name as C File_List as C

argument.name: Database_Name
argument.description: The name of the database to create.

argument.name: File_List
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of table and set filenames that are to be put in the .ADB (database) file.

page.description: The SAVE_ADB_DEF() function creates an Alpha Anywhere database (.ADB) file.
page.example: dim list as C list = load_adb_def("C:\Documents\Alpha_Features\Alpha_Features.adb") ? list = e:\alpha_features\template.dbf e:\alpha_features\alpha_features.dbf e:\alpha_features\quotes.dbf save_adb_def("C:\Documents\Alpha_Features\test.adb", list)
